net.beaconcontroller.devicemanager

Interface IDeviceManagerAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Routing

    public interface IDeviceManagerAware
    Implementors of this interface can receive updates from DeviceManager about the state of devices under its control.
    Author:
    David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deviceAdded(Device device)
      Called when a new Device is found
      void deviceMoved(Device device, IOFSwitch oldSw, Short oldPort, IOFSwitch sw, Short port)
      Called when a Device has moved to a new location on the network.
      void deviceNetworkAddressAdded(Device device, Set<Integer> networkAddresses, Integer networkAddress)
      Called when a network address is added to a Device.
      void deviceNetworkAddressRemoved(Device device, Set<Integer> networkAddresses, Integer networkAddress)
      Called when a network address is removed from a Device.
      void deviceRemoved(Device device)
      Called when a Device is removed, this typically occurs when the port the Device is attached to goes down, or the switch it is attached to is removed.

    • Method Detail

      • deviceAdded

        void deviceAdded(Device device)
        Called when a new Device is found
        Parameters:
        device -

      • deviceRemoved

        void deviceRemoved(Device device)
        Called when a Device is removed, this typically occurs when the port the Device is attached to goes down, or the switch it is attached to is removed.
        Parameters:
        device -

      • deviceMoved

        void deviceMoved(Device device,
               IOFSwitch oldSw,
               Short oldPort,
               IOFSwitch sw,
               Short port)
        Called when a Device has moved to a new location on the network. Note that either the switch or the port or both has changed.
        Parameters:
        device - the device
        oldSw - the old switch
        oldPort - the port on the old switch
        sw - the current switch
        port - the current port on the current switch

      • deviceNetworkAddressAdded

        void deviceNetworkAddressAdded(Device device,
                             Set<Integer> networkAddresses,
                             Integer networkAddress)
        Called when a network address is added to a Device.
        Parameters:
        device -
        networkAddresses - the set of networkAddresses owned by this device including the newly added address at the time of its addition
        networkAddress - the newly added network address

      • deviceNetworkAddressRemoved

        void deviceNetworkAddressRemoved(Device device,
                               Set<Integer> networkAddresses,
                               Integer networkAddress)
        Called when a network address is removed from a Device.
        Parameters:
        device -
        networkAddresses - the set of networkAddresses owned by this device directly after the removal of the specified address
        networkAddress - the removed network address
